text.content:
The Rise of the Runelords

Ten thousand years ago, the empire of Thassilon ruled the lands of Varisia. The empire was divided into seven nations, each ruled by a Runelord who wielded immense magical power.

The Runelords were masters of sin magic, drawing power from the seven deadly sins: wrath, greed, sloth, pride, envy, lust, and gluttony.

The Seven Runelords

  • Alaznist - Runelord of Wrath
  • Karzoug - Runelord of Greed
  • Krune - Runelord of Sloth
  • Xanderghul - Runelord of Pride
  • Belimarius - Runelord of Envy
  • Sorshen - Runelord of Lust
  • Zutha - Runelord of Gluttony
